name: pnp-list-all-list-folders-itemcount
title: Lists number of files in all lists and folders for the given site
shortDescription: List all Lists, the folders and sub folders in a given site, and output the item count.
longDescription: List all Lists, the folders and sub folders in a given site, and output the item count. Each folder is processed recursively. By default only non hidden document libraries are processed.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
